item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/11/13/responsive-images/#comment-4398">Jim Vanderveen</a>.
No problem. Responsive images are a big deal with so many different device sizes and pixel density device combinations out there.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jim Vanderveen.

No problem. Responsive images are a big deal with so many different device sizes and pixel density device combinations out there.
